title: Chris Bruni from Profound Lore Records
itunes:title: Chris Bruni from Profound Lore Records
description:
I had the pleasure of speaking to Chris Bruni, the owner of Profound Lore Records, about his label, the concept of hipster metal and how buying records doesn't support satan. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
